sentences.english: Remember- if you smoke proper after sex you're doing it too fast.

sentences.english: There are now stricter relationship requirements for Woohooing with Sims in the Sarcophagus .

sentences.english: Joey: No, I had sex in high school.

sentences.english: We could hear her having sex every night.
sentences.chinese: 但每晚都能聽見她嘿咻的聲音。
